basics.name: Alex Vañó Viñuales
basics.label: Scientist
basics.summary: Physicist working at the interface between numerical and mathematical relativity, especially on the hyperboloidal initial value problem with conformal compactification methods.

work.name: GRIT, CENTRA, Instituto Superior Técnico (IST), University of Lisbon, Portugal
work.summary: FCT-funded postdoctoral position at 'Gravitation in Técnico', in the group led by Vítor Cardoso, José Lemos and David Hilditch. Teaching at the graduate level.

work.name: Gravity Exploration Institute at Cardiff University, United Kingdom
work.summary: ERC-funded postdoctoral associate position at the Gravitational Physics Group (now Gravity Exploration Institute), working mostly with Mark Hannam. Teaching at the undergraduate level.
highlights: Initial data for numerical relativity simulations, gravitational waveforms
